storyInfo: Cecelia's halo flickers and dims before apprentice executor Ezell's eyes—but how could a Sankta so young be fallen?

attributes.content: Yucatan... doesn't Lateran food bug you at least, like, a little...?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Tastes here definitely lean on the sugary side, compared to Kjerag.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Don't you like sweet, though, Rus?
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: That doesn't mean I can take everything sweet!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: *Sigh* I'm starting to miss Kjerag now.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: It's that bitch Ratatos's fault, all blah blah 'grab every opportunity to reestablish our clan's status'... and she didn’t even come herself, throwing me under the sleigh out here.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: It's a show of the Matriarch's trust in you. After that incident put us on the brink, it was your joint efforts with her that ensured the Browntails held on.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: And you got tossed off to the side. You just love living behind the scenes, don't you?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Personally speaking, getting to see you shine is more than enough satisfaction for me, Rus.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Ooh, when did you learn to talk so smooth?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: That aside, Madame, this conference may turn out more fruitful than we expected.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: We didn't think so many countries would be here. It seems we might've underestimated Laterano's influence.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Yeah, that does sound about right... but don't you change the subject!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: (Leithanian) Ugh, do you not have eyes?!
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: (Leithanian) You bumped into me, I think.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Your Leithanian is an embarrassment. What corner of the hinterland did you scurry out of?
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: I come from Kjerag, and it's certainly not the 'hinterland.'
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Kjerag?
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: What kind of place is Kjerag?
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: Lady Sharon, Kjerag is the nation of the Snow Realm in the buffer zone between Victoria, Columbia, and Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Cheery Legatus

attributes.content: There's a country in those mountains? Hah, the very definition of hinterland!
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: You think an envoy of a trifling glacial state has the standing to be flippant with me, a duchess?
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: Madame, first, I have to stress again, Kjerag isn't some 'hinterland' like you keep saying. You can probably thank your own narrow mind that you've never heard of my country.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Second, you're the one who bumped into me. You owe me an apology.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You dare!
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: Lady Sharon, we're in the Basilica...
attributes.name: Cheery Legatus

attributes.content: Lady Sharon, permit I remind you, you currently stand in Laterano, and not your Leithanian domain.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And who are you?
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: A Lateran Legatus.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What are you trying to tell me, Legatus? This is the Basilica? What, do you intend to declare that as the host, Laterano sides with this provincial creature?
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: Laterano sides with order. Therefore, Lady Sharon, you should apologize to Madame Sciurus.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You know my name?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: You'd expect me to know the names of all the diplomatic envoys, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oh? Then you must be well aware of who I am.
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: Of course, Duchess Francis of Leithanien.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But permit I remind you again, this is Laterano, Duchess.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: In Laterano, you are asked to honor the Commandments and orderly abide the rule of law. No matter what privileges you enjoy in Leithanien, they do not exist nor apply in Laterano.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: This is how Laterano treats its guests?
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: If you're willing to be a 'guest of Laterano,' Laterano will wholeheartedly treat you in kind.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: —Oren, when did you start standing for Laterano, huh?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: As a Lateran Legatus, do I not have the right?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Not in the Basilica.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Lady Sharon, please quell your anger.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Hmph. Don't you think it's a little late to be pacifying me, cardinal?
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: Your Grace, I beg your understanding. The Legatus who contradicted you will be given an appropriate punishment. And rest assured of the Lateran Curia's goodwill during your stay in the guesthouse.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Madame Sciurus, I beg your pardon as well. This fault for this minor misunderstanding lies with our shortcomings. If you would be willing to magnanimously accept my apologies, I hope to invite you in a short while to the side rooms for a talk.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Sciurus looks at Yucatan, and Yucatan gives a subtle nod.
Hah, Laterans. My, my.
attributes.name: Scathing Leithanian

attributes.content: Alessoe, Mattina, please look after these three most important guests in my stead.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Oren, come with me.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Here comes the punishment. Alright, alright...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Yes, the deceased in Pagus Stevonus did not leave behind a will nor any prior registration of one. I'll return to the Notarial Hall in a bit and submit for double-checking.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Currently? I'm at Pagus Stevonus Central Hospital... No, no, I'm alright, I just found a girl injured in a fall, I'm taking her to be examined right now...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: No, I wasn't in a traffic accident...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: No, the parents aren't with her. She's still unconscious, and for the time being we can't confirm her family circumstances. Once she wakes up, I'll bring her back to her guardians.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Right, and if she doesn't wake up soon, I might need to use Notarial Hall privileges to...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: ...Pardon? I can consider this one of my practical assignments...? Alright, I'll fill in all the documents after it's over.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Ah... sorry for that, I'm finished.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: It's alright! The doc's physical checkup is done. No wounds anywhere, nothing on her head, so it probably wasn't a knock on the brain.
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: But the girl does have a small fever. Odds are she was ill. She'll still need a few more tests before we're sure what caused her to pass out, but it won't be anything too bad.
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Doc's set her up in Ward 2127. You can wait there for the examination results.
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Is she your sister? Are you on duty? Why are you bringing your little sister on an executor shift? I barely ever see executors here in Stevonus!
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: She's not my sister.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: So why did you bring her here? Is she your target? Oh, Heavens, are executors really that ruthless? You'd execute a little girl like that? What did she do?
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: I only came across her in the street. She's not my target. She just lives in the vicinity, in all likelihood.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Really? She must be new around here, then.
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: This is the only hospital in Stevonus, so all the kids come here for checkups when they're sick... you should see the sight of the consulting room at Pediatrics whenever the seasons change. It's exhausting!
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Lucky I'm on shift at Recovery next week. Have you heard of our Recovery department? It's famous!
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: The wheelchair rapid-fire competition last year there, oh, heavens me, I've never seen guns blaze that fast before, I still suspect that must've been a Gun-Knight... a little bit young for it, though.
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: What's that look for? Didn't I tell you Recovery was famous? We have multiple people from the Basilica all recuperating here!
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Did you just say... the girl I brought here was newly moved into Stevonus?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I've never seen her before, that's why. If she's not your sister, then a kid that small can't have come scampering from another pagus, can she?
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Well, obviously, there's the possibility I've just never seen her by pure chance. But I can tell a girl like her falls ill day in and day out... I've seen too many of them!
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Where was I? Consulting in Pediatrics? Listen, last week...
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Here you are gossiping with the family again, Elisa. The doctor wants you at the test center to pick up the results.
attributes.name: Serious Nurse

attributes.content: On it—
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: You're sure you fetched the right report?
attributes.name: Conscientious Doctor

attributes.content: Yyyes. Is there a problem?
attributes.name: Blabbermouth Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: I've never seen a blood analysis this strange before.
attributes.name: Conscientious Doctor

attributes.content: Once it's photocopied, send the original to the head doctor's office, along with this note from me.
attributes.name: Conscientious Doctor

attributes.content: I need to pay a visit to Recovery.
attributes.name: Conscientious Doctor

attributes.content: Hmph, that attendant's headed for the head doctor's office. So what now, Patia?
attributes.name: Lateran Citizen?

attributes.content: Allocate two to hold the report-deliverer back. Don't go big. Just hold things off, win a little time, and we're fine.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: What about that doctor?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: It looks like he's gone for Recovery. But not the end Cecelia's in.
attributes.name: Lateran Citizen?

attributes.content: Hm? That works. This way, the executor'll still be in the dark for now.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Everyone else, with me. We'll draw the executor away, and get Cecelia out before the hospital's people reach her.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Remember, move quick, but don't be rough with Cecelia.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: She's our companion.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Don't make her hate us.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.text: Mamma, why do we need to go so far every time we meet Daddy? It's really dark now...
Because... Daddy's not able to come to Lateran City. He can't live with us.
Then can't we stay with Daddy?
Daddy wouldn't want you to stay with him, Cecelia. You'll understand when you're older...
Why...? Does Daddy not like me? Is it because I'm not good enough?\nIf I'm a good girl, can Daddy be with us all the time?
Cecelia... you have to trust Daddy. He loves you, even if he can't be by our side.

attributes.content: Unnh... nnh....
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mamma...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You're awake!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Who... Where am I...?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You're in the hospital, Miss. You fainted in the street, and I took you here since I couldn't find your parents.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Hospital... is this a hospital?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: No... you—you're wearing a uniform, Mamma said...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Has your mama been telling you things?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: (Come to think of it, when I first saw her, wasn't she hiding from me...?)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: It's alright, Miss, I can take you to find your mama. I'm a good guy.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You can help me find Mamma? Ma—Mamma got taken away by people in gowns!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (This might just be a kidnapping case! Is that why she was all alone there?)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Okay, little Miss, stay calm. I'm a Notarial Hall executor. I'll help you find your mama. How did she get taken away?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You're a Notarial Hall...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: That's right, I'm from the Notarial Hall. My name's Ezell. Look, here's my name tag.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Will you really help me find Mamma?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Of course. What's your name?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: ...I'm Cecelia.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: ...Nngh...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Huh?! What's wrong with... your halo...?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: (What is this about...? Even in the most downcast moods, Sankta halos don't dim like this.)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: (Unless...)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: (But a child this small wouldn't even have a patron firearm yet. What could explain this...?)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: ...Nnnh...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (No. Beyond that...)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Cecelia, how do you feel? Is your halo...?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Sometimes... it goes like this... Mamma says I'm ill... it'll be fine soon...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Ezell has realized something.
Amidst her current pain, Cecelia is anxious about her missing mother too.
But he cannot sense any of her pain, nor anxiety, relayed from her.
Cecelia... is without a doubt a Sankta.
How could this be possible?
Cecelia, are you...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Are you this girl's relative?
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Functionally.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Come with me. She's got somewhat special circumstances, and the doctor said he needs to talk with you in private.
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: There was a strong gust of wind just now. I'll close the window, in case she'd catch a cold.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Hm? Of course.
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Alright. Cecelia, just get some rest, I'll be right back.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Don't worry, Cecelia. We'll keep you company.
attributes.name: Amiable Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: The rooftop.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You said Cecelia's circumstances were special. Special how?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Well... we can't be exactly sure yet. We'll need to wait for the diagnosis. The doctor will be here shortly. Just hold on, and we'll see what he has to say.
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: I've already reported Cecelia's situation to the Notarial Hall. My colleagues are fast on their way.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Tell me who you are.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm an attendant, right? What are you talking about? The doctor will be here momentarily.
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Would a normal hospital attendant get nervous hearing the words 'Notarial Hall?'
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: So you suckered me... I only needed to keep you here for a short while anyway. If I were you, I wouldn't be giving myself trouble.
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Patia said to be more gentle with Cecelia... but not with you.
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: 'Patia,' was it?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You'd do well to forget that one.
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant

attributes.content: Come on out. Let's give our Notarial Hall man some break time.
attributes.name: Reserved Hospital Attendant
